name: VENGEANCE 2
description:
In the incredibly ambitious sequel to Vengeance, the one-armed venge-man has a whole new arsenal with which to fight enemies with actual combat AI.  Topher offered to pay me 50 dollars a week to make it but I REFUSED PAYMENT on this labor of love, not until it was finished!!!  unfortunately, that led to me only really polishing up a venge mode (it was supposed to let you build up an arsenal and assault a king, no such luck)

still, it's a neat snapshot- right click changes weapon, left click uses.
